story_description: As a security-conscious user, I want to enable two-factor authentication on my account, so that I can protect my personal information from unauthorized access.
acceptance_criteria: Given a user is logged into their account, when they navigate to security settings, then they should see an option to enable 2FA
Given a user enables 2FA, when they log in next time, then they should be prompted for both password and verification code
Given a user has 2FA enabled, when they lose access to their authenticator device, then they should be able to use backup codes to regain access
dependencies: User authentication system must be in place
tasks: Integrate with authenticator app (Google Authenticator, etc.)
Perform security audit and penetration testing
